name: Fortress Barrage
description:
This game is a new single player breakout style action game that has you battling between computers.

The cool thing is you have special abilities you can use to shoot at other castles in the game. This includes weapons and a shield.

You use these abilities to protect your castle bricks and avatar from being hit by others special attacks and the main game ball.

This game will keep you on the edge of your seat to save your castle and easily pass the time away as a casual game.
